snippet: For decades, the photographer has captured those brief moments before passing taxis or dogs sully the purifying transformation brought by the snow.
abstract: Photographer Jan Staller says he braves blizzards in order to capture New York City landscapes covered in fresh snow.
lead_paragraph: For decades, the photographer has captured those brief moments before passing taxis or dogs sully the purifying transformation brought by the snow.

headline.main: Jan Staller’s Images Show New York’s Untrammeled Snows of Yesteryear
